actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a basic 10,000 dollars exemption from income tax, in the case of an individual or a married couple, for amounts received as annuities, pensions, or other retirement benefits.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals or married couples aged 65 or over a $10,000 exclusion from gross income for any amounts received as annuities, pensions, or other retirement benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a basic 10,000 dollars exemption from income tax, in the case of an individual or a married couple, for amounts received as annuities, pensions, or other retirement benefits.
